sentence: 37 ||| Methods ||| 2.2 ||| Between May 2008 and November 2009, patients at 18-80 years with acute STEMI were recruited into this single-blind, randomized control, open-labeled, multicenter exploratory study, who had been successfully reperfused within 12 hours by means of stent implantation and had a substantial residual left ventricular regional wallmotion abnormality on echocardiography, as well as a creatine kinase MB level more than three times the upper reference value.
label: po.Age
